Capture logs and metrics of Azure resources based on ARM tags.
API Version: 2020-10-01.

<h4 id="logrulesresponse">Log<wbr>Rules<wbr>Response</h4>



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="filteringtags_csharp">
<a href="#filteringtags_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Filtering<wbr>Tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#filteringtagresponse">List&lt;Pulumi.<wbr>Azure<wbr>Native.<wbr>Logz.<wbr>Inputs.<wbr>Filtering<wbr>Tag<wbr>Response&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendaadlogs_csharp">
<a href="#sendaadlogs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Aad<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendactivitylogs_csharp">
<a href="#sendactivitylogs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Activity<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendsubscriptionlogs_csharp">
<a href="#sendsubscriptionlogs_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Subscription<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#filteringtagresponse">[]Filtering<wbr>Tag<wbr>Response</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendaadlogs_go">
<a href="#sendaadlogs_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Aad<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendactivitylogs_go">
<a href="#sendactivitylogs_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Activity<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="sendsubscriptionlogs_go">
<a href="#sendsubscriptionlogs_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Send<wbr>Subscription<wbr>Logs</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

<h2 id="package-details">Package Details</h2>
<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
</dl>
